com.fasterxml.storemate.store.file

Class FilenameConverter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.fasterxml.storemate.store.file.FilenameConverter
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DefaultFilenameConverter

    public abstract class FilenameConverter
extends Object
    Simple helper class we use for cleaning up external path names into clean(er) internal file names. Since there is no requirement to be able to reverse the transformation, clean-up process can often be performed starting with raw byte-based keys.

      FilenameConverter() 

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      abstract StringBuilder appendFilename(StorableKey rawKey, StringBuilder sb)
      Method to call to append filename created from given rawKey in given StringBuilder.
      abstract String createFilename(StorableKey rawKey)
      Method to call to convert given rawKey into filename that is safe with respect to quotable characters.
